verses.name: Psalms 110:1
verses.text: The Lord said unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, until I make thine enemies thy footstool.

verses.name: Psalms 110:2
verses.text: The Lord shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.

verses.name: Psalms 110:3
verses.text: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.

verses.name: Psalms 110:4
verses.text: The Lord hath sworn, and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.
